Description: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Celestial Intersection. Maximum Charges: 2
Allows you to cast your line in space.
Upgrades Summon Bahamut to Summon Phoenix when Demi-Bahamut returns from summoning.

Grants Ifrit's Favor upon executing Summon Ifrit, Titan's Favor upon executing Topaz Rite or Topaz Catastrophe, and Garuda's Favor upon executing Summon Garuda. Enhances Astral Flow according to your current elemental favor. Ifrit's Favor Upgrade: Crimson Cyclone Titan's Favor Upgrade: Mountain Buster Garuda's Favor Upgrade: Slipstream
Increases the potency of Fast Blade to 200, Riot Blade to 140, Royal Authority to 140, Holy Spirit to 350, Atonement to 400, Supplication to 420, and Sepulchre to 440.
Increases the potency of Heavy Swing to 200, Maim to 150, Storm's Path to 160, and Storm's Eye to 160.
Increases the potency of Hard Slash to 180, Syphon Strike to 120, and Souleater to 140.
Increases the potency of Keen Edge to 200, Brutal Shell to 160, and Solid Barrel to 140.

Increases the potency of Geirskogul to 280 and Nastrond to 360. Allows for the sharpening of the Firstminds' Focus upon successfully landing Raiden Thrust or Draconian Fury, up to a maximum of 2 units.
Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 23%.
Upgrades Physis to Physis II.
Increases the potency of attacks dealt by your simulacrum to 420.
Upgrades Flint Strike to Rising Phoenix.
Upgrades Tornado Kick to Phantom Rush.

Upgrades Assassinate to Dream Within a Dream.

Increases the potency of Gekko, Kasha, and Yukikaze to 120.

Allows the execution of Death Rattle. Can only be executed after successfully completing a combo with Flanksting Strike, Flanksbane Fang, Hindsting Strike, or Hindsbane Fang.
Allows the execution of Last Lash. Can only be executed after successfully completing a combo with Jagged Maw or Bloodied Maw.
Allows the execution of Twinfang Bite and Twinblood Bite. Can only be executed after successfully landing Hunter's Coil or Swiftskin's Coil.
Allows the execution of Twinfang Thresh and Twinblood Thresh. Can only be executed after successfully landing Hunter's Den or Swiftskin's Den.
Grants 1 stack of Rattling Coil upon successfully landing Dreadwinder or Pit of Dread.
Allows a third charge of Slither.
Allows the stacking of a third Rattling Coil.
Allows for Serpent Offerings Gauge accumulation upon the landing of certain actions. Furthermore, adds an additional effect to Serpent's Ire that grants Ready to Reawaken. Duration: 30s
Allows the execution of Uncoiled Twinfang or Uncoiled Twinblood after successfully landing Uncoiled Fury.
Allows the stacking of a fifth Anguine Tribute in the Serpent Offerings Gauge. Furthermore, allows the execution of Ouroboros while under the effect of Reawakened.
Allows the execution of First Legacy after First Generation, Second Legacy after Second Generation, Third Legacy after Third Generation, and Fourth Legacy after Fourth Generation.
Allows for Palette Gauge accumulation upon the landing of Water in Blue and Water II in Blue.
Grants White Paint upon the landing of Water in Blue, Water II in Blue, Thunder in Magenta, and Thunder II in Magenta.
Increases movement speed after executing Smudge. Duration: 5s

Hammer Stamp changes to Hammer Brush upon execution, which in turn changes to Polishing Hammer upon execution. Additionally allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Striking Muse. Maximum Charges: 2
Allows the execution of Tempera Grassa. Can only be executed while under the effect of Tempera Coat.
Grants Monochrome Tones upon executing Subtractive Palette. Monochrome Tones Effect: Converts one stack of White Paint into Black Paint
Grants Rainbow Bright upon consuming all stacks of Hyperphantasia. Stacks may be depleted by casting aetherhue spells. Duration: 30s
Grants Starstruck upon executing Starry Muse. Duration: 20s
Allows a third charge of Living Muse. In addition, Claw Motif and Maw Motif may now be performed after executing Living Muse.
Grants 5 stacks of Hyperphantasia upon executing Starry Muse. Duration: 30s

Upgrades Vengeance to Damnation.

Grants a stack of Burgeoning Fury upon landing Fell Cleave or Decimate while under the effect of Inner Release. Duration: 30s Maximum Stacks: 3 At maximum stacks, become Wrathful, upgrading Inner Release to Primal Wrath.
Grants the effect of Primal Ruination Ready after executing Primal Rend. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Blood Weapon to Delirium.
Upgrades Shadow Wall to Shadowed Vigil.
Upgrades Bloodspiller and Quietus to Scarlet Delirium and Impalement respectively.

Grants the effect of Scorn after executing Living Shadow. Duration: 30s Additionally upgrades Carve and Spit executed by your simulacrum to Disesteem, which delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before it with a potency of 620 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
Upgrades Nebula to Great Nebula.
Become Ready to Raze after executing Fated Circle. Duration: 10s Continuation changes to Fated Brand when Ready to Raze.
Grants the effect of Ready to Reign after executing Bloodfest. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Bootshine to Leaping Opo, True Strike to Rising Raptor, Snap Punch to Pouncing Coeurl, and Elixir Field to Elixir Burst.
Grants Wind's Rumination upon executing Riddle of Wind. Duration: 15s
Grants Fire's Rumination upon executing Riddle of Fire. Duration: 20s

Grants Dragon's Flight upon executing Dragonfire Dive. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Vorpal Thrust to Lance Barrage and Disembowel to Spiral Blow.
Grants Starcross Ready upon executing Stardiver. Duration: 20s Effect ends when Life of the Dragon expires.
Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.
Upgrades Mug to Dokumori.
Upgrades Trick Attack to Kunai's Bane.
Grants Higi upon executing Dokumori. Duration: 30s
Grants Tenri Jindo Ready upon executing Ten Chi Jin. Duration: 30s Ten Chi Jin changes to Tenri Jindo while under the effect of Tenri Jindo Ready.
Upgrades Third Eye to Tengetsu.
Upgrades Hakaze to Gyofu.

Grants Zanshin Ready upon executing Ikishoten. Duration: 30s
Grants Tendo upon executing Meikyo Shisui. Duration: 30s Tenka Goken changes to Tendo Goken and Midare Setsugekka changes to Tendo Setsugekka while under the effect of Tendo.
Grants Oblatio upon executing Enshroud. Duration: 30s

Grants 2 stacks of Executioner upon executing Gluttony. Duration: 30s Effect cannot be stacked with Soul Reaver. Effect ends upon execution of any weaponskill or magic attack. Gibbet changes to Executioner's Gibbet, Gallows changes to Executioner's Gallows, and Guillotine changes to Executioner's Guillotine while under the effect of Executioner.

Grants Perfectio Occulta upon executing Plentiful Harvest. Duration: 30s Perfectio Occulta changes to Perfectio Parata upon executing Communio. Effect of Perfectio Parata ends upon gaining the effect of Lemure Shroud.
Upgrades Wide Volley to Shadowbite.
Upgrades Bloodletter to Heartbreak Shot.
Grants Resonant Arrow Ready upon executing Barrage. Duration: 30s
Improves Troubadour's damage reduction effect to 15%.
Grants Radiant Encore Ready upon executing Radiant Finale. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Heat Blast to Blazing Shot.
Upgrades Gauss Round to Double Check and Ricochet to Checkmate.

Grants Excavator Ready upon executing Chain Saw. Duration: 30s Chain Saw changes to Excavator while under the effect of Excavator Ready.

Grants Last Dance Ready upon executing Standard Finish. Duration: 30s
Grants Finishing Move Ready upon executing Flourish. Duration: 30s Standard Step changes to Finishing Move while under the effect of Finishing Move Ready.
Improves Shield Samba's damage reduction effect to 15%.

Grants Dance of the Dawn Ready upon executing Technical Finish. Duration: 30s Saber Dance changes to Dance of the Dawn while under the effect of Dance of the Dawn Ready and the Esprit Gauge is 50 or higher.
Upgrades Thunder to High Thunder and Thunder IV to High Thunder IV.
The location of Ley Lines can be reset while its effect is active.
Allows the stacking of a third Polyglot.
Grants a stack of Astral Soul upon landing Fire IV or Flare. Maximum Stacks: 6
Upgrades Fester to Necrotize.
Grants Ruby's Glimmer after executing Searing Light. Duration: 30s
Allows the summoning of Solar Bahamut in addition to Demi-Phoenix and Demi-Bahamut.
Grants Thorned Flourish upon executing Embolden. Duration: 30s
Grants Grand Impact Ready upon executing Acceleration. Duration: 30s Jolt III and Impact change to Grand Impact while under the effect of Grand Impact Ready.
Grants Prefulgence Ready upon consuming all stacks of Manafication. Duration: 30s Manafication changes to Prefulgence while under the effect of Prefulgence Ready.

Upgrades Medica II to Medica III.
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Tetragrammaton. Maximum Charges: 2
Temperance grants Divine Grace upon execution. Duration: 30s
Grants Impact Imminent upon using Chain Stratagem. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Succor to Concitation.
Reduces Recitation recast time to 60 seconds.
Lord of Crowns can be drawn when executing Astral Draw, and Lady of Crowns can be drawn when executing Umbral Draw.
Grants Divining upon executing Divination. Duration: 30s
Upgrades Aspected Helios to Helios Conjunction.
Allows a third charge of Essential Dignity.
Grants Suntouched upon executing Neutral Sect. Duration: 30s
Reduces Soteria recast time to 60 seconds.
Upgrades Eukrasian Prognosis to Eukrasian Prognosis II.
Extends the duration of the effect increasing HP recovered by healing actions to 15 seconds.
Adds an additional effect to Rampart that increases HP recovery via healing actions on self by 15%.
Extends the duration of Reprisal to 15 seconds.
Extends the duration of Feint to 15 seconds.
Increases the healing potency of Second Wind to 800.

Reduces Swiftcast recast time to 40 seconds.

Occasionally upgrades the effect of Collector's Standard to Collector's High Standard, guaranteeing Brazen Prospector increases collectability with maximum effectiveness. Chance Meticulous Prospector does not affect integrity is increased by 40%.

Occasionally upgrades the effect of Collector's Standard to Collector's High Standard, guaranteeing Brazen Woodsman increases collectability with maximum effectiveness. Chance Meticulous Woodsman does not affect integrity is increased by 40%.

After exhausting a gathering point's resources, occasionally restores all integrity and gathering attempts.
GP is also fully restored, but all gatherer effects expire.
Effect cannot be triggered by certain gathering points such as those found in levequests.

After exhausting a gathering point's resources, occasionally restores all integrity and gathering attempts.
GP is also fully restored, but all gatherer effects expire.
Effect cannot be triggered by certain gathering points such as those found in levequests.
While under the effect of Fisher's Intuition or Spearfisher's Intuition Fisher's Intuition , resets the effect duration when catching certain fish. Chance to trigger this effect differs between fish.
